scripts.build:ios: cd ios && xcodebuild -workspace JudoKitReactNativeExample.xcworkspace -scheme JudoKitReactNativeExample -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator CC=clang CPLUSPLUS=clang++ LD=clang LDPLUSPLUS=clang++ GCC_OPTIMIZATION_LEVEL=0 GCC_PRECOMPILE_PREFIX_HEADER=YES ASSETCATALOG_COMPILER_OPTIMIZATION=time DEBUG_INFORMATION_FORMAT=dwarf COMPILER_INDEX_STORE_ENABLE=NO
scripts.detox:build:ios: detox clean-framework-cache && detox build-framework-cache && detox build --configuration ios.sim.debug
scripts.detox:test:android: detox test --loglevel fatal --configuration android.emu.debug --record-videos failing --record-logs all -R 1
scripts.detox:test:ios: detox clean-framework-cache && detox build-framework-cache && detox test --loglevel fatal --configuration ios.sim.debug --record-videos failing -R 1
